property.name: Rules
property.value: This impulse starts the game in the battle zone with 6 seals on it. This impulse can't leave the battle zone. Forbidden Liberate - When this impulse has no seals on it, flip it to its creature side. (When you seal a card, put the top card of your deck on that card face down. Whenever a Command is put into the battle zone, its owner puts a seal from one of his cards that has the same civilization as that Command into his graveyard. While a creature is sealed, both players ignore that creature.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Triple breaker(This creature breaks 3 shields) When this creature Forbidden Liberates, your opponent puts a seal on each of his creatures. Whenever a spell that costs 4 or less would cause your opponent to choose a creature, they can't choose this one. If this card is anywhere other than the battle zone, you lose the game.

property.name: Rules
property.value:
Evolution - Put on one of your light creatures that cost 9.
Invasion - Light evolution creature that costs 9 (When one of your CONDITIONS attack, you may put this creature from your hand onto it)
Triple breaker(This creature breaks 3 shields) When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may choose up to 9 light creatures that cost 9 from your hand or mana zone and put them into the battle zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Revolution 0 Trigger - Whenever a creature attacks you, if you have no shields, you may reveal this creature from your hand. If you do, reveal the top card of your deck. If it's a non-evolution fire creature, put it into the battle zone, and put this creature on top of it. Evolution - Put on one of your fire creatures. Triple breaker(This creature breaks 3 shields) Whenever you put this creature into the battle zone or attacks, you may choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone. This creature and that creature battle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ​Double breaker(This creature breaks 2 shields) When you put this creature into the battle zone, return all of your shields to your hand. You can't use the 'Shield Trigger' abilities of those shields. Then add the top 2 cards from your deck to your shields face down. Revolution 2 - If you have 2 shields or less, each of your light cards put into your hand from your shields gets 'shield trigger'.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ​Double breaker(This creature breaks 2 shields) During your turn, whenever one of your creatures would leave the battle zone, if its power is greater than 0 and your opponent has 2 shields or less, it stays in the battle zone instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution - Put on one of your water creatures. S-Rank Invasion 'Space' - Water Command(When one of your water commands attack, you may put this card from your hand or battle zone onto it) ​Double breaker(This creature breaks 2 shields) This creature can't be blocked. Whenever this creature would break a shield, your opponent puts the top 2 cards of their deck into their graveyard instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Triple breaker(This creature breaks 3 shields) During your opponent's turn, whenever your opponent puts a card in their mana zone or whenever they use a card, skip the rest of thier turn. Whenever your opponent's creatures attack, after the attack, skip the rest of their turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution - Put on one of your darkness creatures. S-Rank Invasion 'Zombie': Darkness Command(When one of your Darkness Commands attack, you may put this creature from your hand or graveyard onto it) Triple breaker(This creature breaks 3 shields) When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose one of your opponent's creatures. That creature gets -9000 power until the end of the turn.

card.name: Kill the Live, Revolution Demon Dragon

property.name: Rules
property.value: ​Double breaker(This creature breaks 2 shields) Whenever this creature attacks, each player discards a card from their hand. Revolution 2 - Whenever a darkness creature is discarded from your hand, if you have 2 shields or less, put it into the battle zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Speed attacker(This creature doesn't get summoning sickness) ​Double breaker(This creature breaks 2 shields) When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose 2 of your opponent's shields and this creature breaks the rest.

property.name: Rules
property.value:
Evolution - Put on one of your Commands.
Invasion - Revolutionary that costs 6 or more (When one of your CONDITIONS attack, you may put this creature from your hand onto it)
Triple breaker(This creature breaks 3 shields) When you put this creature into the battle zone, put one of your opponent's non-evolution creatures in his battle zone into their mana zone. Then you may put a non-evolution creature that costs the same as or less than that creature from your mana zone into the battle zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution - Put on one of your nature creatures that costs 3. S-Rank Invasion 'Tribe' - Nature creature that costs 3(When one of your nature creatures that costs 3 attack, you may put this creature from your hand or mana zone onto it) If you have 3 or more creatures, this creature gets 'triple breaker'. When you put this creature into the battle zone, if there are 4 or more creatures in the battle zone, choose a creature and put it into its owner's mana zone.

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: ​ {BLOCKER} ​Double breaker(This creature breaks 2 shields) At the end of each of your turns, untap this creature. Revolution 2 - Whenever your opponent puts a creature in the battle zone, if you have 2 shields or less, tap that creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution - Put on one of your water creatures. ​Double breaker(This creature breaks 2 shields) When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may draw 4 cards. Revolution 2 - Whenever your opponent's creatures attack, if you have 2 shields or less, you may use a card that has 'shield trigger' from your hand for no cost.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you put this creature into the battle zone or attacks, choose a number. Until the start of your next turn, your opponent can't cast spells that cost the same as that number and your opponent's creatures that cost the same can't attack or block.

property.name: Rules
property.value:
Evolution - Put on one of your creatures.
Invasion - Funky Knightmare (When one of your CONDITIONS attack, you may put this creature from your hand onto it)
​Double breaker(This creature breaks 2 shields) After this creature attacks, put a non-evolution Funky Knightmare that costs 6 or less from your graveyard under this creature. When this creature is destroyed, put all Funky Knightmares that were under this creature from your graveyard into the battle zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ​Double breaker(This creature breaks 2 shields) When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose one of your opponent's shields and put it into his graveyard. Revolution 2 - If you have 2 or less shields, each of your darkness creatures gets 'blocker' and 'slayer'.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution - Put on one of your fire creatures. ​Double breaker(This creature breaks 2 shields) Whenever your other creatures would battle, you may have this creature battle instead. Revolution 2 - If you have 2 shields or less, your opponent's creatures attack creatures if able.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution - Put on one of your fire creatures. Invasion - Fire creature that costs 3 or more(When one of your fire creatures that costs 3 or more attacks, you may put this creature from your hand onto it) After this creature attacks for the first time each turn, untap it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution - Put on one of your nature creatures. ​Double breaker(This creature breaks 2 shields) Whenever your opponent puts a creature into the battle zone, you may put a non-evolution nature creature that costs the same as or less than that creature from your mana zone into the battle zone. Revolution 2 - If you have 2 shields or less, this creature costs 5 less to summon.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ​Double breaker(This creature breaks 2 shields) You may summon this creature from your mana zone. When you put this creature into the battle zone, for each of your creatures in the battle zone, you may put a nature Invader evolution creature from your mana zone on top of that creature tapped.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution - Put on one of your light creatures. Invasion - Light creature that costs 3 or more(When one of your light creatures that costs 3 or more attacks, you may put this creature from your hand onto it) ​Double breaker(This creature breaks 2 shields) After this creature attacks, add the top card of your deck to your shields face down.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ​ {BLOCKER} When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may choose one of your shields and add it to your hand. Then you may add a card from your hand to your shields face down.(You may use 'shield trigger' ability of a shield added put into your hand in this way)

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: Evolution - Put on one of your water creatures. Invasion - Water creature that costs 3 or more(When one of your water creatures that costs 3 or more attacks, you may put this creature from your hand onto it) ​Double breaker(This creature breaks 2 shields) After this creature attacks, draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ​ {SHIELD TRIGGER} When you put this creature into the battle zone, look at the top 5 cards of your deck. Then put them back in any order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Neither player can take an extra turn. Ultra Saver: ???(When one of your ??? would leave the battle zone, you may destroy this creature instead)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution - Put on one of your darkness creatures. S-Rank Invasion 'Zombie' - Darkness Command(When one of your Darkness Commands attack, you may put this creature from your hand or graveyard onto it) ​Double breaker(This creature breaks 2 shields) When you put this creature into the battle zone, put the top card of your opponent's deck into his graveyard. Then, return all cards that have the same cost as that card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution - Put on one of your darkness creatures. S-Rank Invasion 'Zombie' - Darkness Command(When one of your Darkness Commands attack, you may put this creature from your hand or graveyard onto it) Slayer(Whenever this creature battles, destroy the other creature after the battle) ​Double breaker(This creature breaks 2 shields) When you put this creature into the battle zone, during your opponent's next turn, each of his creatures must attack if able.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution - Put on one of your fire creatures. Invasion - Fire creature that costs 3 or more(When one of your fire creatures that costs 3 or more attacks, you may put this creature from your hand onto it) ​Double breaker(This creature breaks 2 shields) After this creature attacks, destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power 3000 or less.

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: Evolution - Put on one of your nature creatures. Invasion - Nature creature that costs 3 or more(When one of your nature creatures that costs 3 or more attacks, you may put this creature from your hand onto it) ​Double breaker(This creature breaks 2 shields) After this creature attacks, put the top card of your deck into your mana zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each of your opponent's creatures must attack this creature if able. Each of your other creatures gets 'guardman'(When one of your other creatures is attacked, you may tap this creature. If you do, the attacking creature will attack this creature instead)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Revolution 0 Trigger - Whenever a creature attacks you, if you have no shields, you may cast this spell for no cost. Reveal the top card of your deck. If it's a nature creature, put one of your opponent's creatures into it's owners mana zone. After you cast this spell, shuffle it into your deck instead of your graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution - Put on one of your light creatures. When you summon this creature, you may reveal any number of cards that cost 9 in your hand. For each card you reveal, this creature costs 1 less to summon. It can't cost less than 1. ​ {BLOCKER} ​Double breaker(This creature breaks 2 shields)
